transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan, main ji se baat kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan, sir, Angikar good morning.
Customer: Good morning.
Executive: Haan, sir, is din aapne call kiya tha actually aapko main laga raha tha tab lag nahi raha tha aapka Saturday ko.
Customer: Sir, ji mujhe ye jaanna hai ki haan isko iske jo leads ko conversion ke liye AI ka kuch setup hota hai kya?
Executive: Kya sir?
Customer: AI software ka kuch koi setup bhi hota hai jo lead uh auto reply wagera deta hai jo leads ko aa rahe hain.
Executive: Sir, sir abhi aap lead consume nahi kar rahe hain matlab abhi koi bhi conversion nahi hai sir abhi tak.
Customer: Nahi consume bhi nahi kar rahe hain aur ye to phone bhi nahi kar rahe.
Executive: Nahi abhi main dekh raha hu query check ki aapke sir 8 tarikh ko ek inquiry aaya hua hai direct ek dusra requirement ki main bataata hu.
Customer: 8 tarikh ko haan.
Executive: Ye aapko aaya hua tha abhi NPM uh GY capsule ka requirement daalna tha baat kiya tha aapne Pratik ji se.
Customer: Nahi, nahi kiya tha. Accha abhi abhi wo to mudde sahi hai lekin hum hamare liye kya important jo hum baat karna chah rahe the haan wo ye ki lead ko convert karne ke liye shayad koi AI software bhi hota hai kya?
Executive: Nahi nahi AI nahi actually sir aapka number bhi isme dekh raha hu aap thode number bhi change kijiye calls bahut miss ho rahi hai jo aapko aati hai main dekh raha hu.
Customer: Aap mere sawal ka jawab hi nahi de rahe hain.
Executive: Haan AI ka sir isme bata raha hu na AI ka isme sir waisa kuch nahi hai aapko direct inquiry aapke matlab jo catalog view hota hai uske through aati hai sir. AI ka isme matlab kuch logo nahi hai.
Customer: Nahi isme log batate to hai isme ki haan maine kya kisi me dekhi dekha hai haan to likha to hai ki AI se lead ko setup banaya ja sakta hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi AI ka isme nahi hai sir aapke product ki visibility ke upar hai jaise abhi maine catalog bhi sir use kiya hua tha abhi aapke jo buylead aa rahi hai na wo thodi bulk ki nahi hai abhi hai na sir bulk ke order nahi hai jyadatar hai na.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Aapke aapke jo abhi aa rahi hai wo bulk ke order nahi hai ye actually kya inse aapko ek baar baat jaise ki abhi ek requirement sir aaya hua tha ye uh nano cucin spicer lycopene tablet me deal karte hain?
Customer: Nahi isme nahi karta.
Executive: Isme nahi karte. To phir ek sir ye aapko ek requirement aaya tha moxicin anti eye drop me?
Customer: Nahi isme bhi nahi.
Executive: Kya isme bhi nahi karte iske wajah se bulk ke order nahi hai sir aapke pass hai na.
Customer: Na.
Executive: Uh bas ek aapka bulk ke order nahi aa rahe hain bas thode chote chote order hai sir abhi aapke pass ye aap hmm hmm haan jaise ki abhi isme karte hain sir septic 100mg tablet me sir septic.
Customer: Nahi isme bhi nahi karte.
Executive: Ye aapko sir waisa requirement aayenge par ek ek do do pieces ki sir jyada requirement hai aapke pass hai na hmm hmm bulk ke order nahi hai baki sir direct inquiry jaise ki main dekh raha hu number bhi show ho raha hai aap rukna ye number batana mujhe ek baar ye kiska number hai ye sir ye phone aapko yaad nahi hai to is number pe yaad nahi hai aapki uh 801 kiska number hai sir sorry ye aapka 323 last me 323.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Mera hai 12933.
Executive: Chalo main isme main dekhta hu aapka call miss ho rahi hai sir iske liye to aapke jo last haan ye aapka 323 jo preferred number hai ya ya ek to aapne ye kar rakha hai sir 936 wala active ye aapka ye wala na jo ye yahi ek number hai aur dusra number maine uh dusra number jo hai na wo block ho gaya.
Executive: Haan. Wo kya ho gaya? Wo nahi chal raha. Dusra number abhi work nahi kar raha hai. Accha double five double five four one yahi yahi ek number hai isi isi number pe agar call aayega to main uthaunga aaj aaj tak ek bhi call nahi aaya. Accha pichle 12 13 saal se aap log yahi bol rahe hain ki call miss kar raha hai call miss ho raha hai. Jo number mere pass hai usme nahi aayega to phir call miss hoga hi. Kisi aur ko ja raha hai call. Haan ek to 936 hai aur aapko bataata hu ek aur number hai. Usko hata dijiye delete kar dijiye dusra number haan wo wala hata du haan keval ek hi number rakhiye. Haan sir aur ek sir ek aur requirement sir aapko aaya tha Gorakhpur se aap Gorakhpur se hi to hai iske haan haan haan inka ek aaya tha sir aapko requirement velgate capsule me deal karte hain na V E L G U T nahi nahi thik hai sir aapko ek requirement aapko direct inquiry aayi hui thi Gorakhpur se velgate sir inko requirement sir do do box ka uh inko requirement hai ye order value kam se kam 3000 ka hai inme deal nahi karte sir velgate capsule me nahi velgate nahi. To ye Gorakhpur se sir aapko aaya hua tha. Nahi aaya tha wo jiska hai wo deal karega na main kyu karunga. Nahi direct inquiry jo aapke pass fire direct inquiry dalta hai na aapko hum ye requirement hai wo aapko aayi hui hai. Main ye keh raha hu ki maan lijiye X naam ka mera product hai haan aur Y naam se aa raha hai jo kisi aur ka hai to main kaise usko us inquiry ka mere liye kya matlab haan sir yahi hai thoda bhi bulk ke order nahi hai kyuki main dekh raha hu pharmaceutical me hai na aapko bulk ke order to abhi jyada hai nahi ek ek piece ka matlab aise requirement hai hai na sir hmm hmm haan bulk ke order main dekh raha hu uh ek sir aapko ek Delhi se teen ghante pehle aaya hua tha aciclofenic paracetamol isme karte hain sir ji haan isme karte hain aciclofenic paracetamol iska sir aapko Delhi se aaya hua tha aap ye matlab isko ye pahli baar consume kar sakte hain abhi abhi aap open kare IndiaMART kitne piece hai sir isme teen name se baat karna padega inme quantity nahi dala apna hmm inse aap baat karna hai ye teen pehle pehle problem ye hai ki aap log jo bata rahe hain call miss ho raha hai call miss call jaa kaha raha hai mere samajh me nahi aa raha mobile to har waqt mere pass rehta hai. Sir ek kaam kare aapka koi call miss hua hai kya aapne kabhi call kiya ho aapne kabhi call kiya ho to phir nahi nahi nahi hua to ek kaam kare sir number jo edit hote hain wo aapke side me honge sir jo aap number delete hatana chahte hain na haan to ek ek kaam karna hai aap desktop me use karte hain na IndiaMART ki phone me hmm kis me use karte hain sir IndiaMART phone me use karte hain desktop me computer dono phone me bhi desktop me bhi to ek desktop me ek kaam karna hai jaise aap setting me jayenge na setting wale option me haan usme sir setting me jaane ke baad PNS call setting ka bhi option aata hai sir PNS call setting hmm usme sir aapko number dikhenge aapko usme se ye apna jo hai na wo 554 wo wala aap hata dena edit ke option me bhi aap jayenge to wo aap yaha se delete kar dena wo number thik hai thik hai haan aur jo aapka ye wala hai na isko dobara se edit 936 wale dobara add kar dena isme jaake thik hai haan ye kar lena uske baad dekhte hain call aapko miss hoti hai ya nahi thik hai sir are ek hi ek hi number rakhunga main apna wala thik hai na haan ye wala karna ek kaam kar setting me jayenge na aap setting option aata hai thik hai setting me jaane ke baad PNS call setting ka aur andar jaise jayenge to usme upar option dikhega PNS call setting PNS haan PNS call setting me jaake aap apna 554 wala number delete kar dena aur 936 wala usko dobara se add kar dena hmm thik hai 936 wala phir dekhte hain call miss ka matlab ho rahi hai ki nahi thik hai sir thik hai iske baad dekhte hain phir hum baat karte hain abhi office kaun jaate hain haan to aapse baat karte hain okay sir aur bulk ke order to abhi waisa dikh nahi rahe hain aur abhi jo aaj buylead aayi hui hai na sir maine batai Delhi wali sir hai na hmm wo aap consume karega aapko buylead aa rahi hai abhi ek ek do do wali bhi unse baat kariye unse kahiye ki bulk order ke liye aap aise baat kar sakte hain jo aapko ek ek piece ki dikhti hai na sir wo aap wo aap consume kare phir unse baat kare ki hum bulk order bhi agar wo sample ke taur pe aapko ek product chahte hain to wo bol dena aap main de dunga lekin unse aap unse sir aapko bulk order ki baat sample nahi hota hai wo consumer hote hain jinko ye piece chahiye hota hai wo humne maine usse kai baar baat ki hai haan haan aur baad me wo order bhi nahi dete hain payment karne pe order ki baat karne pe wo reply bhi nahi dete hain uske baad accha accha sir ek uh aap matlab kitna minimum kitna order chahiye minimum value aapke liye kitni honi chahiye sir jaise koi quantity ka order aaya aapko kitna kam se kam 1000 ka to hona chahiye na 1000 piece ka hai na hmm kam se kam sir ye aapka order sir abhi minimum quantity ka hai quantity ki baat nahi kar rahe hain 1000 value sir 1000 minimum value hai na haan accha accha to upar se aapke pass order hai kafi 1000 minimum wale to lekin minimum wala nahi hai na mera nahi hai nahi nahi ye wala dekhiye moxicin anti eye drop me deal karte hain sir moxicin nahi karte accha isme nahi karte na to aaj main yahi kaam karunga aaj jo aapko 1000 tak ke minimum order hai wo main aapko aaj whatsapp pe send karunga thik hai sir dekhne ke baad hmm haan jo aapko minimum 1000 value ke jo rupee ke order hai wo main aapko send karunga aaj thik hai dekhne ke baad phir aap mujhe batana ye aapke matlab ke hai ya nahi thik hai sir accha jo bhi query aate hain direct mere whatsapp pe nahi aa sakte kya nahi sir wo whatsapp pe nahi aate aapko ye check karna padega jaise ki ab maine aapko us din sikhaya tha na jaise aap phone me use karte hain IndiaMART usme aap jaise lead lead manager me jaate hain na lead manager me hmm lead manager me aapko direct inquiry dikhti hai lead manager me jayenge to upar option aata hai more ka more ka option aata hai sir haan malum hai wo haan usme sir aapko dikhti hai ek aapko inquiry to ek aaya hua tha check karna aaj inquiry khol ke thik hai sir thik hai phir main karta hu aur kitne baje tak office me rehte hain aap sir main 6 baje tak rahunga aaj chaliye 5 aur 6 ke beech me baat karunga aapse thik hai thik hai sir bilkul thik hai thik hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Enquiring about AI setup for lead conversion.

- Not receiving calls on the registered number.

- Inquiries are not relevant to his products.



Resolution:

- Explained that AI setup is not available.

- Executive will send relevant inquiries on WhatsApp.

- Guided to delete the old number and add new.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back between 5-6 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, number update, pns call settings

seller_categories.mcat_name: Polyethylene glycol and Propylene Glycol Eye Drop
